headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline' https://unpkg.com https://cdn.tailwindcss.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.tailwindcss.com; img-src 'self' https://image.tmdb.org https://img.youtube.com data:; connect-src 'self' https://api.themoviedb.org; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; frame-src https://www.youtube.com; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self';
